news.title: Gas supplies reduced by 50%
news.subtitle: Gas supplies to Europe reduced significantly.
news.content: Russia has reduced gas supplies to Europe by 50 billion cubic meters over the past 4-5 months, as of October 1, the drop was 47%, said the head of Novatek, Leonid Mikhelson.

news.title: Kiev power shortage
news.subtitle: Critical facilities put out of action.
news.content: "Kiev Electric Networks": A number of critical facilities have been put out of action, a power shortage of 30% of consumption has arisen in Kiev and the region - in order to prevent a complete blackout of the capital and central regions, unprecedented emergency restrictions are introduced

news.title: Rocket fuel plant destroyed
news.subtitle: Plant producing solid rocked fuel struck.
news.content: Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation: A plant for the production of solid rocket fuel, explosives and gunpowder was destroyed in the Dnepropetrovsk region.

news.title: Quadrocopter mass production
news.subtitle: Russia producing a thousand of drones.
news.content: Almaz-Antey announced that it has begun mass production of quadrocopters - by the end of the year, about 1 thousand drones will be produced at a price "significantly lower than foreign analogues".

news.title: Kherson direction difficulties
news.subtitle: Situation unpleasant for Kiev.
news.content: The situation in the Kherson direction is changing in an unpleasant direction for Kiev, Aleksey Arestovich, adviser to the head of Vladimir Zelenskyâ€™s office, said on the YouTube channel of journalist Mark Feygin
